      • getUhcPlayer

        public UhcPlayer getUhcPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        This method is used to get the UhcPlayer object from Bukkit Player. When using this method in the PlayerJoinEvent please check the doesPlayerExist(Player) to see if the player has a matching UhcPlayer.
        Parameters:
        player - The Bukkit player you want the UhcPlayer from.
        Returns:
        Returns a UhcPlayer.

      • findRandomSafeLocation

        public org.bukkit.Location findRandomSafeLocation(org.bukkit.World world,
                                                  double maxDistance)
        This method will try found a safe location.
        Parameters:
        world - The world you want to find a location in.
        maxDistance - Max distance from 0 0 you want the location to be.
        Returns:
        Returns save ground location. (When no location can be found a random location in the sky will be returned.)
